item.title: Sello oil in Altoona PA on 12 Feb 2021
item.description: Sello Oil price update on 12 Feb 2021 What is sello oil? Sello oil (Sel-Lo Oil) is a fuel supplier and distributor in Altoona, PA, United States of America. They deliver different kinds of fuel like Ultra-low-sulfur diesel oil (Dyed ULSD), blended fuel, kerosene fuel, and heating oil. Sello Oil company established in 1988 has been operated by a family in central Pennsylvania. Sello oil company is one of the largest heating oil distributors in central Pennsylvania.
